biography.title: Biography
biography.introduction: Passionate about web development for over 5 years, I specialize in creating modern and performant web applications. My journey has allowed me to acquire solid expertise in full-stack development, with a particular focus on user experience and development best practices.

list.1: Quality and attention to detail in every project

goals.title: Professional Goals
goals.description: My goal is to continue developing innovative solutions that have a positive impact while staying at the forefront of new technologies. I constantly seek to push my limits and share my knowledge with the community.
